meanings.definition: The total number of units in a group or collection.
meanings.sent1: The unitages of the toys in the box were counted carefully.
meanings.sent2: She calculated the unitages of all the books on the shelf.
meanings.sent3: The unitages of candies in the jar seemed to magically increase.
meanings.sent4: The unitages of stars in the sky were beyond counting.
meanings.sent5: The unitages of leaves on the tree created a beautiful sight.

meanings.definition: The act of determining the number of units in a group or collection.
meanings.sent1: His unitages of the coins in the jar were accurate.
meanings.sent2: The unitages of the students in the classroom were completed by the teacher.
meanings.sent3: The unitages of socks in the drawer were a fun challenge to figure out.
meanings.sent4: Her unitages of the puzzle pieces were like solving a mystery.
meanings.sent5: The unitages of flowers in the garden required careful counting.
